title: Top laner's build against all-AD team

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Because Tryndamere had no flash and I had already told Jax that his only job, literally, is to go tank, I camped top, put Jax ahead 3-0. He goes back and starts buying Daggers and whatnot. I had my trepidations, but didn't say anything. Lo and behold, he loses to Trynd in a duel, being up 3-0, because he goes completely facepalm items. Anyway, from there he starts building MR. Don't be like this Jax.

replies.body:
... are you being sarcastic??

His build order is:
{{item:3078}} -> {{item:3143}} -> {{item:3111}}  -> {{item:3742}} -> {{item:3156}} 

{{item:3143}} is triple effective against one team with {{champion:23}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:236}}, he didn't build {{item:3156}} until 36 mins and {{champion:143}} did the most damage anyway, and Jax took 22k AD and 12k magic.

Really need to post this game? [It isn't like he rushed MR](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/137101234/200370696?tab=builds&participant=3)
Wait, Tri-Force or Iceborne? Which would you go?

{{item:3078}} got a massive buff in 6.11 and is core on {{champion:24}}.

Also this Jax built {{item:3143}} before {{item:3742}}, unlike you who built them the other way would of taken more damage vs the Critlords.

Name and shaming is not ok.

Also don't be a douche just because someone lost lane.
Naming and shaming? Click the URL. It's completely public. Never mentioned anybody's name.
Praise be PRiNTER BEEN, the god that carries crybaby junglers.

Are you serious? Its not really public (It is if I have to look at it)
But you looked this guy up. YOU did, then posted a link about him to us. saying "Don't be this guy"
Yes, that is name and shaming.

Remove it, or admins will remove it for you.
I'll wait and see. Not sure if I'm breaking the rules. Hope I'm not.
Uhhh, they had Zyra, it was not all AD?

> I had already told Jax that his only job

Alright Captain
